snippet.title: "Atomic Butcher: Homo Metabolicus" announcement trailer
snippet.description:
„Das Humankapital“ is happy to announce that „Atomic Butcher: Homo Metabolicus“, the sequel to their 2004 title „Atomic Butcher“. Out now on Steam for Windows PC/Mac/Linux, go get it here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/523970 :D

Ravage the  post-apocalyptic earth once again as the world's hungriest mutant – the ATOMIC BUTCHER –  who is on an eternal quest for fresh meat in this over-the-top, fast-paced platformer with 360° shooting. Kill your enemies in a multitude of ways – Pee them to death, throw corpses of slain enemies on them, electrocute them, drop chainsaws on them – and then EAT THEM!

The original Atomic Butcher was released as freeware back in 2004, an indie game from a time before indie games were on the radar for most gamers. Despite that, it became quite popular among lovers of gory retro-games with a love for decidedly off-beat humor.

Follow us on 
FB: https://www.facebook.com/atomicbutcher/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/atomic_butcher
Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=650695447
